spatial_accuracy.notes: Significant failure in wall alignment and room proportions. The central staircase/utility block is vertically elongated, crushing the dining area. Door swings are inconsistent and windows show incorrect spacing relative to the blueprint.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major structural errors include the hallucination of a low partition wall in the dining area not present in plans. The bay window geometry is distorted, and the adjacency between the WC and the utility entrance is blurred.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen stove and island elements are roughly placed but kitchen counters lack the specified 'L' shape and appliance orientation (Refrigerator/REF placement is incorrect).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong isometric projection and clean clay-style rendering. Lighting and shadows are consistent, though some geometry clipping occurs near the stairs.

detected_errors.description: Severe proportion distortion of the central corridor and staircase block.
Hallucinated partition wall/counter in the dining room area.
Misplaced kitchen appliances (Stove and Sink orientation flipped vs plan).
Incorrect door leaf orientation and missing swing paths in the central hall.
Rendering artifact/distortion on the bay window geometry.
